name: By The Beach
content: In the sun by the beach we are swimming
阳光下 沙滩边 我们畅游嬉戏
Play along with my friends swim all day
和朋友们一起玩耍 游上一整天
Come along wade along do your swimming
来吧 一起欢闹一番 尽情畅游
Just have fun laugh along play all day
尽情欢乐 一起欢笑 玩上一整天
In the sun by the beach we are kicking
阳光下 沙滩边 我们在踢沙滩球
Play along with my friends swim all day
和朋友们一起玩耍 游上一整天
Come along wade along do your kicking
来吧 一起欢闹一番 尽情踢球
Just have fun laugh along play all day
尽情欢乐 一起欢笑 玩上一整天
In the sun by the beach we are swimming
阳光下 沙滩边 我们畅游嬉戏
Play along with my friends swim all day
和朋友们一起玩耍 游上一整天

来吧 一起欢闹一番 尽情畅游
Just have fun laugh along play all day

In the sun by the beach we are paddling
阳光下 沙滩边 我们在划船
Play along with my friends swim all day
和朋友们一起玩耍 游上一整天
Come along wade along do your paddling
来吧 一起欢闹一番 一起划船
Just have fun laugh along play all day
